channel.title: Comments on: The Cure to work with Ashley Simpson?

item.title: By: Robert Smith taunts press with new Ashley Simpson collaboration rumors, loses what few defenders he still had
item.dc:creator: Robert Smith taunts press with new Ashley Simpson collaboration rumors, loses what few defenders he still had
item.description: [...] wacky and throwing your credibility down the shitter, the latter of which seems to be his MO as of late. I guess when you hermetically seal yourself inside a delusional bubble of sychophants and [...]
